tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ownership_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT NOT NULL,
    previous_owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    new_owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ownership_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT NOT NULL,
    previous_owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    new_owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    change_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE OwnershipHistory (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID REFERENCES Property(property_id),
    previous_owner_uuid UUID REFERENCES Owner(owner_id),
    new_owner_uuid UUID REFERENCES Owner(owner_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ownership_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    previous_owner_id INT,
    new_owner_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES properties(property_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (previous_owner_id) REFERENCES property_owners(owner_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (new_owner_id) REFERENCES property_owners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    seller_id INT,
    buyer_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES properties(property_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (seller_id) REFERENCES property_owners(owner_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (buyer_id) REFERENCES property_owners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id)
);
